name: More compact styled blog.roblox.com
description: The current version of blog.roblox.com is so spacey that it's even spacey on my phone. That's not good.. so here's comes compact mode.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info: More will be coming to compact this even more while being normal. Also this was the first update, it won't stay messy with sizing.
